tool.name: SAGA.grids_tools.6
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPOINTS False isArrayZ_FIELD False isArrayV_FIELD False isArrayTARGET_TEMPLATE False output_data_GRIDS $output_data_GRIDS name SAGA.grids_tools.6 POINTS $POINTS Z_FIELD $Z_FIELD Z_SCALE $Z_SCALE V_FIELD $V_FIELD TARGET_DEFINITION $TARGET_DEFINITION TARGET_USER_SIZE $TARGET_USER_SIZE TARGET_USER_XMIN $TARGET_USER_XMIN TARGET_USER_XMAX $TARGET_USER_XMAX TARGET_USER_YMIN $TARGET_USER_YMIN TARGET_USER_YMAX $TARGET_USER_YMAX TARGET_USER_COLS $TARGET_USER_COLS TARGET_USER_ROWS $TARGET_USER_ROWS TARGET_USER_FITS $TARGET_USER_FITS TARGET_TEMPLATE $TARGET_TEMPLATE TARGET_USER_ZSIZE $TARGET_USER_ZSIZE TARGET_USER_ZMIN $TARGET_USER_ZMIN TARGET_USER_ZMAX $TARGET_USER_ZMAX TARGET_USER_ZNUM $TARGET_USER_ZNUM SEARCH_RANGE $SEARCH_RANGE SEARCH_RADIUS $SEARCH_RADIUS SEARCH_POINTS_ALL $SEARCH_POINTS_ALL SEARCH_POINTS_MIN $SEARCH_POINTS_MIN SEARCH_POINTS_MAX $SEARCH_POINTS_MAX DW_WEIGHTING $DW_WEIGHTING DW_IDW_POWER $DW_IDW_POWER DW_IDW_OFFSET $DW_IDW_OFFSET DW_BANDWIDTH $DW_BANDWIDTH prefer $prefer response $response outputType_GRIDS $OutputSection_GRIDS.outputType_GRIDS transmissionMode_GRIDS $OutputSection_GRIDS.transmissionMode_GRIDS

param.name: POINTS
param.label: Points
param.help: Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: json, xml, vnd.google-earth.kml+xml

param.name: Z_FIELD
param.label: Z
param.help: Z The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: V_FIELD
param.label: Value
param.help: Value The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: TARGET_USER_COLS
param.label: Columns
param.help: Number of cells in East-West direction.

param.name: TARGET_USER_ROWS
param.label: Rows
param.help: Number of cells in North-South direction.

param.name: TARGET_TEMPLATE
param.label: Target System
param.help: use this grid's system for output grids The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, x-ogc-envi, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff

param.name: SEARCH_RADIUS
param.label: Maximum Search Distance
param.help: local maximum search distance given in map units

param.name: SEARCH_POINTS_MIN
param.label: Minimum
param.help: minimum number of points to use

param.name: DW_IDW_OFFSET
param.label: Inverse Distance Offset
param.help: Calculates weights for distance plus one, avoiding division by zero for zero distances

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_GRIDS
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_GRIDS
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Inverse distance weighted interpolation for 3-dimensional data points. Output will be a grid collection with evenly spaced Z-levels representing the 3rd dimension.
